display_long_description:
This music-making experience combines traditional musical tools with the experimental potential of VR.

Features:

Drum Machine: A drum machine

16 Step Sequencer: Scale the heights of your musical creativity with our Big 16 step sequencer. Climb up and down, setting the rhythm and pace of your tunes.

Sequilinder: Resembling a giant cylinder, this unique instrument lets you set your notes by stabbing spears into it.

Harp & Marimba: Experience the classical touch of Harp and Marimba. Play these instruments with your hands, use sticks, or loop the sounds to create beautiful melodies.

Drone Shield Synth: Add layers to your composition with our Drone Shield Synth. This feature is perfect for adding depth and atmosphere to your music.

Kalimba: Incorporate the soothing, melodic sound of a Kalimba into your composition. Its rich, mellow tones will transport you and your audience to a serene musical landscape.

ADSR and Effects: Manipulate the Attack, Decay, Sustain, and Release (ADSR) of your sounds, and add effects to enhance your musical creation.

Global Clock Sync & Scale Control: All your instruments and effects are synchronized to a global clock, ensuring perfect tempo alignment. Moreover, you can control the musical scale, adding a personal touch to your creations.

Regardless of your musical background, this app allows you to explore and experiment, unlocking new levels of creativity. Try it today and start your musical journey in the vast world of VR!
